message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can move on!
Not bad, but I'm thinking I deserve a bit more. Your turn!
I'll give you a bit more this time, Bob. Don't make me regret it!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied. Keep trying!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'm not backing down!
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any more desperate. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not going to make it easy for you!
I'm not leaving without a fight, Bob. This is my final offer!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it, but don't expect a better deal from me!
